name: sap.watt.saptoolsets.fiori.project.fioriw4template
description: Templates to create Fiori wave 4 starter applications.

template:categories.name: SAP Fiori Application (Internal)
template:categories.description: SAP Fiori starter applications for internal SAP users

template:templates.name: SAPUI5 Master-Detail Application - Scaffolding, 1.28 only (internal)
template:templates.description: An SAP Fiori master-detail application for internal SAP developers. Use only for new applications with target UI5 release 1.28. Use the "SAPUI5 Master-Detail Application" template for newer UI5 target releases.

template:templates.name: SAPUI5 Fullscreen Application - Scaffolding, 1.28 only (internal)
template:templates.description: An SAP Fiori full screen application for internal SAP developers. Use only for new applications with target UI5 release 1.28. Use the "SAPUI5 Worklist Application" template for newer UI5 target releases.
